浾浾浾

Related Character(s): 泟
Связанный символ (и): 泟

浾字的基本解释

浾
chēng
棠枣汁。

浾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chēng］
［《廣韻》側加切，平麻，莊。］
［《集韻》癡貞切，平清，徹。］
亦作“泟1”。
棠枣之汁。《说文·赤部》：“浾，棠棗之汁也。”棠枣之汁色赤，故亦泛指赤色汁液。

浾字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浾； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页625第23
【唐韻】敕貞切【集韻】癡貞切，?音檉。【說文】棠棗汁。　又【集韻】資辛切，音津。又【廣韻】側加切【集韻】莊加切，?音樝。義?同。　【說文】本作䞓。【集韻】或作赬。亦作泟。

浾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
浾字的起名意思

暂无。

Fen
Basic explanation of words
Fen
chēng
Tang jujube juice.
Fen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chēng]
["Guangyun" side cut, plain hemp, Zhuang. ]
["Jiyun" is infatuated, clear and thorough. ]
Also known as "泟1".
Juice of Tang Jujube. "Shuowen·Chibu": "Fun, the juice of Tang jujube." The juice of Tang jujube is red, so it also refers to the red juice in general.
Fen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　浾; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 625 23
[Tang Yun] Chi Zhen cut [Ji Yun] Chi Zhen cut,? Sound tame. [Said the text] Tang jujube juice.　[Jiyun] The capital is eager, Yinjin. Also [Guang Yun] side add cut [Ji Yun] Zhuang add cut, sound haw. Righteous? Same.　【Said Wen】This is a Cheng. [Ji Yun] or make a verdict. Also known as 泟.
